Adjustable packing flange.
Stem guides reduce side thrust.
Long cycle life.
Low, uniform torques.
Blowout-proof stem.
Live-loaded thrust washer prevents galling and provides a secondary stem seal.

Long cycle life.
Low, uniform torques.
Blowout-proof stem.

One-piece heavy wall body for high structural strength to ASME B16.34.
